Constructor Detail

MorphDistancePreprocessing

public MorphDistancePreprocessing(java.lang.String termsDir,
                                  java.io.File indexDir,
                                  java.lang.String queryField,
                                  int morphType,
                                  int termIndex,
                                  int scoreIndex,
                                  int topNum,
                                  double scoreThreshold,
                                  boolean skipFirst)
Parameters:
termsDir -
indexDir - assign null
queryField - currently not in use
morphType - 1 = allLemmas, 2 = best lemma
termIndex - the index of the term in the splitted line
scoreIndex - the index of the score in the splitted line - might be -1
topNum - number of terms to read from the input file
scoreThreshold - threshold for the loaded terms
